label: Void / Zero Point

traditions.Pythagorean: The Monad, the womb of number.

nd_notes: Zero is the trauma-safe 'pause' — a void where no demand is made.

label: Monad / Unity

traditions.Greek: The indivisible source of all numbers.
traditions.Hermetic: Kether on the Tree of Life.

nd_notes: Safe anchor: start point for pattern recognition.

label: Dyad / Polarity

traditions.Alchemy: Sulfur and Mercury; red and white.

nd_notes: Good for ND learners: polarity maps (yes/no, on/off).

label: Triad / Harmony

traditions.Greek: Number of completion — beginning, middle, end.

nd_notes: Use triangular patterns, trines in astrology, triple rhythm.
